A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie gets two stars for the special effects and zero for the plot.  The story was awful\, and it scrapped everything that was mysterious and special about the Jedi.  Everyone is now inherently awesome.  Dedication to study?   Pointless.  Years of training?  Don't need it.  Guidance from a wise mentor?  Absolutely unnecessary.  Just show up\, waive a light saber a couple of times\, and you are immediately the GOAT.  I think I am done with Star Wars.
